metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12243 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In filter.c in slapd in OpenLDAP before 2.4.50, LDAP search filters with nested boolean expressions can result in denial of service (daemon crash).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12243` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.2
libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.2
libldap-common - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.2
slapd - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.2
slapd-contrib - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.2
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openldap package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.2').
